description:
BPM syncs more to the song
Arranged Instruments in order of appearance even more
Changed The main Guitar Solo section to follow the Solo Guitar 2
Fixed some Bridge Vocals
Edited the second Chorus Guitar Riff
Turned down Volume of the Keyboard Synth
title: Lonely Day

description: Actually Changed Synth to Sawtooth
title: Lonely Day

description:
Rearranged the Instruments so it's more in order of appearance
The Guitar Arpeggio has a small mute in the other Strings when playing the open C# because of the Chord change
The main Guitar Solo is a bit based on the Live solo
Added another Solo Guitar track for the open string Tremolo so it's not out of order
Corrected the Guitar Riff in the second Chorus
Serj Vocals changed to Baritone Sax to match his voice type
Changed Synth to Sawtooth
Added back the Note Names and Changed a Chord Name
title: Lonely Day

description:
Partial rework

- Changed time signature to correct one (6/8)
- Created a "Main" guitar track to make it easy to follow
- Update some guitar stuff
- Updated tempo stuff
title: Lonely Day

description:

description:

title: Lonely Day

description:
Edited Vocal Harmonies and made Vocals louder
Added another Guitar, moved the Solo Guitars to the bottom and corrected the 2nd half of the Solo
Edited Note names and Chords a bit
Edited Piano and Synth
title: Lonely Day

description:
A note name was wrong in Guitar 1 wich was repeated
Corrected Vocals during first Chorus and added some details
Changed Serj's Vocals instrument
Made Vocals a bit more easier to read
title: Lonely Day

description:
Changed Chord names
Added Note names to other instruments
Different Let Rings and Ties in Guitar 1 that is more accurate to the song
Arranged Extra Guitars from lowest to highest
Harmony Guitars in Verse and Bridge are easier to play
Added a Note on each bar in Distortion Guitar at the first Chorus and outro Pitch Down
The Solo makes more sense! Figured out what Guitar 4 does, Guitar 5 Joins in at bar 69th, Guitar 2 plays low harmony with different Notes
Added Bends to Vocals, changed some Note Durations and different rhythm at the last Chorus
Changed Synth to Lead Voice and added a Note in some bars
Some BPM changes and Outro Decrescendo ties better into Soldier Side
Volume adjustments, Daron's Vocals turned down and Guitar 1 and 5 play during the Bridge and Verse to make the harmony sound louder
title: Lonely Day

description: Fixed!
title: Lonely Day

description: Retuned the bass and guitars accordingly, other instruments are in standard tuning with added notes names, added bass to the last verse, removed some Let Rings on the Clean guitar, added more details to the solo and made it more consistant, pitched down Daron's vocals during the verses and bridge, rearranged drum's notes to make it easier to read, edited the outro one more time and hopefully the volume is Ok. 2nd try!
title: Lonely Day
